body:
I also see alot of people complaining about the "Mean" ending, and a lot of people defending it, But to me the ending seemed relatively  wholesome - it just isn't flat out said.  

They clearly love him by the end, even if it's proceeded by hentai levels of hardcore sex.

Strangely Mediocre, most it's aspects were adequate - if only adequate - art was acceptable, dialogue was fine, sexiness was good, but it's story really hampered it.

I often forget how much story matters for Wank Material, and it just isn't a very good story. I was honestly surprised where it ended because it felt like it had finally began it's stride - only to end feeling kind of "off". 
What I thought was unnecessarily long build up for the story turned out to be the entire story, it end's in a pretty unsatisfying way, creating problems and not really solving it. 
lot's of kinky sex, but it was all just so boring you're waiting for the story to start but it just kinda doesn't. 
It's the literary equivalent of blue balls. 

I strongly suspect the author was forced to end it early as we see extra characters in the opening that never even make a appearance, and the ending feels very underwhelming and a bit strangely paced.
Great art, but rather sucky story imo

Wow so he saves his sister from getting raped and she wants his attention and the dude has a fked up girlfriend and both sister and his girlfriend fks him literally and figuratively both his body and his life jeez he should've just let his sister get raped and let her die and rot on some gutter and same for the girlfriend too it turned from BDSM to literal abuse jeez good job author in triggering us

Folks in the comments, y'all do know this is hentai, right? When I read a yaoi tentacle fucking mpreg, I do not complain that the guy couldn't possibly birth a slime baby because he is a man and men are stronger than slime. Gtfo of here. It's drawn Japanese porn. Take it or leave lol
The imouto needs to goto. Incest is trash and I did not enjoy it. He actually likes fucking the gf. Just stick with her.

All these people claiming others can't tell the difference between hentai and real life are also hypocritically unable to tell the difference between femdom and literal abuse and assault.

Real femdom is consensual submission to a female, which can range from mild to extreme. Some dudes might enjoy getting railed in the ass, I'm not here to judge. But this is clearly just abuse, assault, and rape. The guy takes no pleasure from it, basically breaks down crying at the end, and ruins his whole life. Saying this is similar to real femdom is saying you'd be fine with getting dragged into an alley, chloroformed, and then woken up by violent fisting. And to anyone saying he was asking for it, he states he did it to try and avoid a worse fate, or he's clearly under duress, which means you will try and say anything to appease your assaulter/captor in hope they will stop and let you go.

If you still get off to this, whatever. But this isn't femdom, and you're horribly misinformed.

so many casuals
Oh shit i meant hate this story.. I need to stop typing without looking.. to many mess ups make me seem young apparently.

Then just say stop overall, dont fight fire with fire anf certainly dont use the excuse of "oh this happens to females all the time (no it doesnt) so ha! Hes getting what all males deserve in doujin" as an excuse to ignore this guys clear suffering... How would you feel if you were forced to fuck your brother, or continuing to go through sexual abuse by your boyfriend right after you just got your brother to stop only for him to come back? You souldnt like it at all, and i can only assume thats what this dumbass mc feels. Again dont use gender equality as an excuse to dismiss others pain

And the loveless torture is just what made me hate this comment... i could stand this if both of the girls had clearly shown that they loved him, not one doing it cause they didnt get their way after they said they didnt want it(then continues to do it after the problem was solved, that ticked me off the most) and certainly not one who was just doing it to feed there fantasy of torturing guys...overall I have no problem with femdom but this ruined dudes life.. I wouldnt mind a continuation but the author should find some way for the dude to get payback even if its just at the end of the chapter something like "i've gone through so much this past year or 2, i cam finally get payback at these 2." Unless either dude has come to like the abuse or he ran away/killed himself... Up to the author at that point... ALSO STFU KENRA, DONT TRY TO TURN THIS INTO A GENDER ISSUE, THIS IS NOT HURTING FEMINISM OR EQUAL RIGHTS AT ALL, if yyou trupy wanted the shit that happens to females in vanilla douji

I honestly had no problem with this cause i went in blindy thinking "hey! Maybe this can turn around since hes a martial artist that maybe, just maybe he can idk run away or actually engage in consensual sex with either of the two girls... but nah, i was wring and he was fucked in the ass (pun intended). Honestly, yall can have fetishes if you want but there has to be a limit to that shit, ruining the guys life is where it shiuld retrospectively stop.. I personally as the artist would've stopped at 1 of the 3 things that happened here, cum drinking (unlikely since most vanilla doujin has the female swallowing it), anything torture with anal penetration ( i dont mind a strap on but the water fountain? Cmon, even making him lick it up? Thats hella dirty with all those germs) and lastly the LOVELESS TORTURE AND PETTY GRUDGE... It really annoys me when females judt decided "oh, i fuck up everything because he didnt wanna walk to school with me after i clearly didnt want him to..
This is INCONCEIVABLE!
Hahh... okay I am leaving this room...

Honestly male domination and rape has pretty much become vanilla to me it's all so boring and predictible and i personally just preffer femdom because of it having so much more variety (personal opinion). I should've never read this or the fucking comments. I only have myself to blame (y'all only have yourselves). And bringing in sex (biological sex) is just... I'm not even sure. I'm shit at words. I agree with WarAngel though.

Ravenleaf got less defensive and so was better able to articulate himself, good job. My point is the same. Non-sexual cruelty in a sex book is just moronic. And for the people trying to push more cruelty, that's just sad. It's clear we don't like it so you want us to go experience even more and worse. Makes sense. And as for the pointless addition of sexism, I don't care about women being abused in material I'll never see. I wanted to see Femdom and girls using strap-ons on guys. Not a guy's life being ruined or erased. That is an absolute turn-off. Thus I expressed myself.
So many comments to read lol so ima just say Im on the side that hate this

@mame I've actually got some far crueler than that hanging around somewhere if I wanna dig through my collection, double S ended on a sweet note actually. Its hard to be mad at that once you realize how happy everyone is and that she confirmed it in the final panel.  my favorite story like that is this one: https://nhentai.net/g/103292/ if you read my comment and apply it to double s, you'll understand why I think its a rather sweet ending as both are rather similar in subplot

@Kanra you're mistaken, I love all of this save that final chapter. Not that I'm against it, you wanna know the part that actually broke me on it? you're gonna think its dumb, but what she did/said about the gift he got for her. Its like "awww, c'mon." everything else was fine but seriously, he bought that for her and was really trying to make her happy and she verbally shit all over it, feels bad
If you think this is cruel go read Double S Size
Fuck everyone ravenleaf . I enjoyed it . And thanks for this

Everyone is mad about the cruelty in this, but how many hentai manga are there with women being abused even worse? Raped, forcefully impregnated, broken, etc etc etc. So much hentai manga is just women being abused to please guys and their fantasies, so maybe don't complain so much when there are just a few out there where the man has to be hurt and tortured. 

And yeah I get this was likely created by a guy for guys but as a woman who has to look through a shit ton of rape manga to find any good ones, let us have a few where the guy suffers for once. At least this guy somewhat deserved what he goes though (not all of it, no, but some) whereas many woman in hentai manga are just abused for no reason. 

To the men in the comments who are complaining this is gay or stupid or wrong- fuck you. You don't have to read it, there's no changing that it exists, and you're all pieces of shit in my mind.

JFC are you like 13 Warangel? you seriously are trying way too hard to overcompensate to sound more intelligent. I made my points, I have no idea how much effort it took you to come up with a response that is completely different from how you talk, but I'm not impressed. I honestly agree with the unnecessary cruelty in this, at least as far as the last chapter goes,(In fact, go read my initial comment about it before people took this to upload, I mentioned it) but everything else you said is absolute non sequitur and bullshit. For the record, if you want to "sound intelligent" be consistent. Its kinda hard to take you seriously when you obviously worked way hard just for the sake of being petty

@ravenleaf Both of your comments are as puerile and useless as most of your other comments. You fail to insult my intelligence without even being able to use substantive points. You write exactly the same as a high-school punk who thinks they know everything already when in absolute fact, they are a mere moron without the actual learning and wisdom to pull off their sad charade. If you were worth more, I'd correct your stupidity about whether you're allowed to critique fiction because it's apparently not important enough or something.
As for my free speech, you're conflating. Like an idiot. So the admins aren't currently policing your attempts to censor everyone who doesn't like what you like. That is a shame. What ISN'T a shame, however, is your own lack of capability to actually censor other readers. So apparently anyone here CAN in fact say whatever they want, as it stands. Luckily, I only wished to express my displeasure at the unnecessarily mean-spirited nature of this work.

Also let me clarify your "free speech" that is something that applies to Government prosecution. You can't run into work and call your boss a fucking idiot because its your opinion and think there can't be consequences. The reason why you get to say all this shit and everyone here does is because the admins of this site don't care. Its by the rules of the where you are. Its rarely enforced on the internet, but morons like yourself seem to think that means you can say whatever you want whenever, that is not the case. this right here isn't "opinion" this is fact. Don't believe me? go into your work place and insult everyone and see if its okay just because its an opinion. Its not entitlement here, its that people can't be bothered over such petty shit.

@warangel you need some reading comprehension lessons. Its seriously laughable you are trying to correct me when you clearly have no clue what I was talking about which is hilarious since I was responding to you. examples of what people like =/= about this manga. My comment wasn't about this manga. It was about uppity retards like yourself who can't figure out that fiction isn't something to get riled up about and that you are mostly just obnoxious and a pain in the ass when this is a place for people to enjoy themselves. I'm not here to dissect one of my favorite manga, I know it inside and out. What I commented on was dumbass comments like yours. Do you get it yet or do I need to use smaller words and reiterate myself 3-4 more times? If it's any solace, I repeat myself a lot because too many of you on here have literally no reading comprehension.

There's no need for disassociation, because you've missed the point yet again. It's not about a guy being dominated or being treated like any girl. He is horribly abused in this. His sister and the girlfriend characters both are ready and willing to throw his life away in a heartbeat. The sister actively tried to ruin his life over an idiotic and petty grudge. And yet the male was made to look like a bad guy for being in a bad mood once. How does that have anything to do with sex? You're too simple and shallow a person to even understand nuance and depth to even garbage like this. In other words, you're fucking stupid. And there's no "Ruination" tag to have read beforehand to know this was going have petty and mean-spirited parts, rather than just a male being happily used by any number of strong women. 

And yeah, the site is public. You don't even have to sign in to anything to peruse any manner of illegal and/or repugnant material.
Shit bastards go to die for like a shit like this..

Hi. Okay fucktards, I'll say it again. If you can't disassociate works of fiction and reality, you need real psychological help. This is a work of fiction. Its not real. The idea of a guy being treated like the girl is appealing and hot to some guys. To some guys they like watching some guy steal some other guys girl. Again, all fiction. If you are getting pissed off feel a need to shoot off and be whiney, go to where it'd be understood, where people are the same as you. This here is a femdom title, so ergo, people who like femdom read it. If you are reading it even knowing you don't like it, you're fucking stupid. If you can't realize how much of a tool that makes you, keep shouting off. Its not that you have the "right" to your opinion you morons, its that the owners/caretakers of this site can't be bothered. Most of you who don't understand this shouldn't be here, because I highly doubt you're 18. GTFO.
>public forum ...... fuck no you're not

Everyone who doesn't like being judged for your proclivities, fuck you. You're on a public forum. You don't get to censor anyone else just so you feel like less of a sick piece of shit. What you should be doing is shutting the fuck up and letting people who don't even know you personally and are never going to do whatever the fuck they want, since it doesn't affect you in any way.
 Similarly, keep in mind judges (myself included because this piece is good art and an absolute shitstain story of contrived abuse, rather than much real sex), that you're only here to vent about how reading any specific piece pissed you off with how bad it is (ideally) or worse, how you secretly liked it and now feel shame. That's on you, bro.
 As for any specifics, most fetishes have their place. This story wasn't real femdom, it was just females unrealistically abusing a male in a bad plotline. That's my complaint, anyway. That and the turds who feel a need to defend themselves thru someones bad work.

Guys, don't discriminate people who has a fetish different from yours, some like femdom, yaoi, gore, vore, footjob, prostate, incest, normal sex etc...
